unmodifiableList().Description: Gets a read-only view of the list of object of this ArrayObjectAdapter.

Parameters: int: The position of first item that has changed.
int: The count of how many items have changed.
notifyArrayItemRangeChanged(int, int).Description: Notify that the content of a range of items changed. Note that this is not same as items being added or removed.

Parameters: Object: The item to add to the end of the adapter.
add(java.lang.Object).Description: Adds an item to the end of the adapter.

Returns: Index of the first occurrence of the item in the adapter, or -1 if not found.
Parameters: Object: The item to find in the list.
indexOf(java.lang.Object).Description: Returns the index for the first occurrence of item in the adapter, or -1 if not found.

Parameters: int: The index at which the items should be inserted.
Collection: A @B_java#util#Collection_E@ of items to insert.
addAll(int, java.util.Collection).Description: Adds the objects in the given collection to the adapter, starting at the given index. If the index is >= @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ArrayObjectAdapter#size_E@ an exception will be thrown.

Returns: True if the item was found and thus removed from the adapter.
Parameters: Object: The item to remove from the adapter.
remove(java.lang.Object).Description: Removes the first occurrence of the given item from the adapter.

isImmediateNotifySupported().Description: Returns true if the adapter pairs each underlying data change with a call to notify and false otherwise.

get(int).Description: Returns the item for the given position.

clear().Description: Removes all items from this adapter, leaving it empty.

size().Description: Returns the number of items in the adapter.

Parameters: int: The index of the first item to remove.
int: The number of items to remove.
removeItems(int, int).Description: Removes a range of items from the adapter. The range is specified by giving the starting position and the number of elements to remove.

Parameters: int: The index at which the item should be inserted.
Object: The item to insert into the adapter.
add(int, java.lang.Object).Description: Inserts an item into this adapter at the specified index. If the index is > @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ArrayObjectAdapter#size_E@ an exception will be thrown.

Parameters: int: The index of item to replace.
Object: The new item to be placed at given position.
replace(int, java.lang.Object).Description: Replaces item at position with a new item and calls notifyItemRangeChanged() at the given position. Note that this method does not compare new item to existing item.
